string.name: STR_CHAT_TEST_FA_KR_GOSSIP
string.body: Testing--1, 2. Testing--1, 2.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_TempestElemental_El_55_Al_Start1
string.body: Curses to those who disturb the Current of Life.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_TempestElemental_El_55_Al_Skill1
string.body: Oh, Breath of Life, return to the embrace of Pazuzu!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_TempestElemental_El_55_Al_Die1
string.body: Finally... I can return to him...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_TempestElemental_El_55_Al_Die2
string.body: Pazuzu has finally... found a way to return...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Start1
string.body: None shall touch this artefact.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Start2
string.body: Your pathetic power won't get you to the artefact.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Skill1
string.body: You dare threaten me with attacks such as that!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Skill2
string.body: Creatures of Aether, come forth and help me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Skill3
string.body: Return to the flow of Aether, Daevas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Skill4
string.body: Only death awaits those who intrude.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingE_Wi_55_Al_Die1
string.body: Ah... I must protect... the... Aion Tower...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Start1
string.body: You won't touch the artefact, no matter what happens!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Start2
string.body: Those who threaten the artefact shall be returned to the flow of Aether!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Skill1
string.body: Face the wrath of the protector!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Skill2
string.body: Only death awaits those who intrude.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Die1
string.body: I will curse you until the end...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_Boss_ElementalkingH_Wi_55_Al_Die2
string.body: Ah... The power, power of... Aion is...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanBoss_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Thou shalt all return to the Aether's flow!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanBoss_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Kneel before the might of the earth!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanBoss_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: Thy bodies shalt become heavy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanBoss_55_Ah_Skill3
string.body: I will not be defeated by some lowly Daevas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticElNamed_53_Ah_Start1
string.body: This shall be your grave.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticElNamed_53_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Face death, and despair.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticElNamed_53_Ah_Die1
string.body: Argh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticFiNamed_53_Ah_Start1
string.body: You shall not pass here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticFiNamed_53_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Face death, and despair.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticFiNamed_53_Ah_Die1
string.body: Argh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticAsNamed_53_Ah_Start1
string.body: How dare you come here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticAsNamed_53_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Off to the darkness, all of you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_FanaticAsNamed_53_Ah_Die1
string.body: Argh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_DrakanFiNamed_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: You fools. There is nowhere to run!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_DrakanFiNamed_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: The enemies are here.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_DrakanFiNamed_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_OctacideNamed_54_Ah_Start1
string.body: Kwiii!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_OctacideNamed_54_Ah_Die1
string.body: Kwiii!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimEngineerNamed_54_Ah_Start1
string.body: I'll kill anyone who disturbs my work!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimEngineerNamed_54_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Oh no! I haven't finished the job yet...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimBoss_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Who dares seek out the Petraliths?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimBoss_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Great Aion! Please forgive your poor servant...who has failed to fulfil his duties...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimNamed_54_Ah_Start1
string.body: You won't get past me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_NepilimNamed_54_Ah_Die1
string.body: No mercy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Kneel before me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Thou art not bad!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_SpecterNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: There is nothing but bloody death for intruders.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_SpecterNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: No, I can't lose anything else.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_SpecterNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Urrrgh....

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanScNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Thou shalt not escape!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanScNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ah...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanFiNightNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Thou shalt be my redemption.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanFiNightNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: We shall all be redeemed.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanFiNightNmd_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: Tiamat's favour is with us!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_UnDrakanFiNightNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiDayNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Thou shalt be my redemption.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiDayNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: We shall all be redeemed.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiDayNmd_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: Tiamat's favour is with us!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanFiDayNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_HugeSlimeNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Gurrrgle....

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_HugeSlimeNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Burp blerp...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_LichNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Fresh meat! Fresh meat!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_LichNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Come forth, my faithful servants!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_LichNmd_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: Hurry and devour these foolish Daevas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_LichNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Waagh!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_StDrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Whoever ye may be, thou shalt not escape this curse.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_StDrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Who dares despoil this holy place?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_StDrakanFiNmd_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: My curse shall be upon thee!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ShadowStalker_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Something... has come...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ShadowStalker_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Rebirth... Rebirth... Rebirth...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ShadowStalker_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Bye... Bye... Bye...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_BonedrakeNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Thurzon the Undying assumes an attacking posture!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_BonedrakeNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Thurzon the Undying roars!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_BonedrakeNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Thurzon the Undying screams!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DeathNightNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: You shameful, dirty, cowardly dregs!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DeathNightNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Waugggh!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DeathNightNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Finally! I'm free of the curse! I'll never forget your kindness.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ElementalFireNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Time to incinerate!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ElementalFireNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Flarestorm begins to laugh wickedly!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ElementalFireNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Flarestorm lets out a shriek and disappears!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_ShulackNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: You'll never get back home alive!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_Boss_Shulack_Knight_Skill1
string.body: Waaaaaaaah!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Shulack_IDCatacombs_1_Wakeup
string.body: You saved my life. Thank you very much!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanMonkBossNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: You stupid, foolish Daevas.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanMonkBossNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: The glory of Tiamat shalt spread across the world!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanMonkBossNmd_55_Ah_Leave1
string.body: Fools! Now dost thou understand the might of the Balaur?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DrakanMonkBossNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: No! The seal! It must not break, or...!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Start1
string.body: Freedom! And what luck that you're the first thing I've seen, Daeva.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Skill1
string.body: Experience the power of storms!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Skill2
string.body: Come, thunder. Come, lightning. Wreak your havoc!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Skill3
string.body: I'll blow you all away.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Skill4
string.body: I can feel it. My powers are coming back!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Skill5
string.body: Even sealed, you worthless bugs are no match for me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCatacombs_DragonNmd_55_Ah_Die1
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_BrownieWa_NM_20_An_1_batk_b
string.body: Who are you? Do you have permission from master Hamerun?

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_BrownieWa_NM_20_An_2_batk_b
string.body: You won't come here, Daeva! Kakiti will stop you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_RatmanWa_NM_20_An_1_batk_b
string.body: I have no Odella to give to Daeva.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_RatmanWa_NM_20_An_2_batk_b
string.body: All Odella is for master Hamerun.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_BrowniePrisonWa_NM_20_An_1_batk_b
string.body: I shall not forgive you, Daeva, for getting in the way of master Hamerun!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_BrowniePrisonWa_NM_20_An_2_batk_b
string.body: Intruder! Protect master Hamerun!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_Hameroon_NM_20_An_1_batk_b
string.body: Aren't you a fearless one, to charge into Haramel like this!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_Hameroon_NM_20_An_2_batk_b
string.body: I won't hand over my precious treasures so easily!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_Hameroon_NM_20_An_3_batk_b
string.body: I will turn you into another one of my minions!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_Hameroon_NM_20_An_1_kcast2_b
string.body: My servants, attack the one who defiles Haramel!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BIDNovice_Hameroon_NM_20_An_2_kcast2_b
string.body: My worshippers! Attack the enemy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast4_b
string.body: Children of Drakan... Give your blood to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast4_b
string.body: Young Drakan, aid the Dramata!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast1_b
string.body: Feel the fury! Feel my pain and wrath!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast1_b
string.body: Die! You should all die!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast13_b
string.body: Death to you all...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast13_b
string.body: I shall punish you with my power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_die_b
string.body: It can't end... like this...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_die_b
string.body: I hate myself! I resent this cursed body of mine...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Dramata_57_Al_3_die_b
string.body: I should have... Become a... Great dragon...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast4_b
string.body: Oh, precious life... I will protect you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast4_b
string.body: Do not touch my eggs!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast1_b
string.body: My cry shall deafen your ears and blind your eyes!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast1_b
string.body: Fear me! You must fear me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_kcast13_b
string.body: Be gone! Forever!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_kcast13_b
string.body: The earth will bind your feet.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_1_die_b
string.body: O Tiamat... Avenge me...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_2_die_b
string.body: My...my eggs...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Dramata_57_Al_3_die_b
string.body: Avenge me... Drakan of Inggison...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_kcast1_b
string.body: Aid me, honourable warrior of Elysea!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_kcast1_b
string.body: All prayers to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_3_kcast1_b
string.body: It is time for us to defeat the enemy! Give all your strength to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_kcast2_b
string.body: Terror and death to the accursed intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_kcast2_b
string.body: Be terrified forever!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_3_kcast2_b
string.body: Pay the price with your lives!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_WonkiockFail_1
string.body: Still not enough! Prove your determination!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_WonkiockFail_2
string.body: Victory is nigh!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_die_b
string.body: Lord Kaisinel... please help us...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_die_b
string.body: It isn't over yet... Lord Kaisinel will come to our aid...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_kcast1_b
string.body: Help me, heroes of Asmodae!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_kcast1_b
string.body: Pray for victory!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_3_kcast1_b
string.body: We must stop the enemy! Give your strength to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_kcast2_b
string.body: This is the end for the intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_kcast2_b
string.body: This is the end! Be gone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_3_kcast2_b
string.body: The scale of victory has tipped to our side.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_WonkiockFail_1
string.body: Victory is close! Asmodians, show your strength!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_WonkiockFail_2
string.body: Pray harder! The enemy's end approaches!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_1_die_b
string.body: Is fate... giving up on me...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BDF4_Henchman_60_Al_2_die_b
string.body: Lord Marchutan! Please save us!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Hierarch_Patterns_01
string.body: Shhh. First give a prayer to Empyrean Lady Siel.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Hierarch_Patterns_02
string.body: Glory to Empyrean Lady Siel!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Hierarch_Patterns_03
string.body: Lady Siel, give me strength!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Hierarch_Patterns_04
string.body: And enlightenment to the foolish one!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2low_Key_PrisonGuards_38_An_1_Batk_S
string.body: Kromede has escaped!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2low_Key_PrisonGuards_38_An_1_Die_S
string.body: Ugh...is anybody there...?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2low_Key_GuardBoss_38_An_1_Batk_S
string.body: You have some guts coming out of there!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2low_Key_GuardBoss_38_An_1_kcast4_b
string.body: Damn it, master Kaliga has raised a Karnif pup.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2low_Key_GuardBoss_38_An_1_Die_S
string.body: Nevertheless...you won't be able to leave here alive...

string.name: STR_CHAT_Torture_Patterns_01
string.body: Heh, what do we have here? A new toy?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Torture_Patterns_02
string.body: What do you think of this new torture?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Torture_Patterns_03
string.body: Ugh...you will pay for this....

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2up_Key_Butler_38_An_1_Batk_S
string.body: You are an uninvited guest.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCromede_2up_Key_Butler_38_An_1_Die_S
string.body: Argh, I must inform my master that a guest has arrived....

string.name: STR_CHAT_Wife_Patterns_01
string.body: Oh my! Who are you? And how dare you stroll into my bedroom just like that!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Wife_Patterns_02
string.body: Why don't you try playing with my kids?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Wife_Patterns_03
string.body: Just wait. Once I let my husband know, you will be finished.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AssiJudge_Patterns_01
string.body: My skills are superior to yours!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AssiJudge_Patterns_02
string.body: Behold! This is my power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AssiJudge_Patterns_03
string.body: You are undeniably strong....

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_01
string.body: How dare you come here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_02
string.body: This is precisely what those who seek to climb above themselves need!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_03
string.body: You have grown powerful, Kromede. But still not enough to contend with me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_04
string.body: I need to rest.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_05
string.body: Come forth, my children!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_06
string.body: You still have a long way to go. I will summon an opponent who will suit you perfectly.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_07
string.body: Damn it, I raised a Karnif pup!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_08
string.body: So, shall we start again, then?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Judge_Patterns_09
string.body: The real battle begins now.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AngryJudge_Patterns_01
string.body: You dare challenge me? How exciting!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AngryJudge_Patterns_02
string.body: This is my first judgment!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AngryJudge_Patterns_03
string.body: This is my second judgment!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AngryJudge_Patterns_04
string.body: Beg for forgiveness, before it's too late!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AngryJudge_Patterns_05
string.body: You fool! This is my last judgment!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_Raid_Nr_Patterns_01
string.body: Mmmmm.... Rumble....

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Raid_Nr_Patterns_01
string.body: Heh heh heh, I will destroy everything....

string.name: STR_CHAT_NPC_Robstin_Patterns_01
string.body: No, Kromede! Run!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip1
string.body: How is the creation of Pletus coming along?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip2
string.body: The upper part is completed.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip3
string.body: We are running out of time. Hurry up and finish!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip4
string.body: Yes, master.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip5
string.body: The Reians must have been desperate to send you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip6
string.body: Nice try... but it won't work.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip7
string.body: I imprisoned Davlin, so this mansion is MINE!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip8
string.body: My golem will crush you and your pet Reians!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip9
string.body: You're better than I thought. Not that it will do you any good.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip10
string.body: That's it! No more pulling my punches!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip11
string.body: I'll teach you the price of provoking me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip12
string.body: This is what sets me apart from scum like you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip13
string.body: I'll finish this Huge Soul no matter what!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental2_DramaticGossip14
string.body: You and your precious Reians will meet your doom!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedB_Skill1
string.body: Thou shalt come to grief!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedB_Skill2
string.body: I'll get rid of the cursed ones first!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedB_Die
string.body: My lord Surama... I.. am... sorry.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedC_Skill1
string.body: Power is... overflowing...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedC_Skill2
string.body: Arrggh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedC_Skill3
string.body: I'll... kill you all...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedC_Die
string.body: I need... more... Dragel...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedE_Idle
string.body: Useless!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedE_Skill1
string.body: Thy meddling shall cease!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedE_Skill2
string.body: Ha, fly little Daeva... if you can.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedE_Skill3
string.body: I'll show you what real power looks like!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedE_Die
string.body: It's a shame... I deceived even Tiamat... and now a mere Daeva...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE1_L_Boss_Skill1
string.body: This Crucible certainly has lowered its standards.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE1_L_Boss_Die
string.body: You're better than I thought.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R1_Skill1
string.body: Let's start with some basic skills.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R1_Die
string.body: At least you know the basics.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R1_Skill1
string.body: How about starting from the basics?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R1_Die
string.body: At least you know basic skills.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R2_Skill1
string.body: If your enemies are afraid, you'll have an easy time.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R2_Die
string.body: You have nerves of steel.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R2_Skill1
string.body: Stay on your toes if you want to win.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R2_Die
string.body: You're good.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R3_Skill1
string.body: I won't pull my punches.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R3_Die
string.body: Excellent!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R3_Skill1
string.body: I won't pull my punches.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R3_Die
string.body: That's amazing.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R4_Skill1
string.body: I never thought you'd do so well.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_R4_Die
string.body: Excellent.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R4_Skill1
string.body: I never thought you'd make it as far as me.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_R4_Die
string.body: You're every bit as good as they said.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_Boss_Skill1
string.body: The Stigma encapsulates the power and minds of our ancestors.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_Boss_Skill2
string.body: You think you can take me with that tactic?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_L_Boss_Die
string.body: You make your family line proud.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_Boss_Skill1
string.body: The Stigma holds the memory of ancient warriors.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_Boss_Skill2
string.body: I expected more of you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE7_D_Boss_Die
string.body: You are very good at communicating with the Stigma.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE8_Boss_Skill1
string.body: Who are you Daevas?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE8_Boss_Skill2
string.body: I hope you all burn!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE8_Boss_Die
string.body: Why... why do we have to fight?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_Skill1
string.body: Who dared call me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_Skill2
string.body: Only death awaits thee!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_Skill3
string.body: Pathetic. Funny, but pathetic.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_Skill4
string.body: Be gone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_End
string.body: You have no idea... who I am.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE10_Boss_Die
string.body: I kept my bargain...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_Ranger_Broad
string.body: Here, over here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF4Re_Drana_NamedA_Die
string.body: Thank you for freeing me from my Balaurean chains.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Unicorn_DramaticGossip1
string.body: Release me...from this curse.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Unicorn_DramaticGossip2
string.body: Release me...from this curse.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Unicorn_DisplayMsg1
string.body: The curse that binds Jurdin asserts itself.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Unicorn_DramaticGossip3
string.body: Thank you. You released me from my curse.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDElemental1_Unicorn_DramaticGossip4
string.body: Now I can...protect the forest...again.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE1_D_Boss_Skill1
string.body: This Crucible certainly has lowered its standards.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDArena_STAGE1_D_Boss_Die
string.body: You're better than I thought.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S3_Elemeltal_CTRL_01
string.body: Welcome, Daeva. I am Administrator Arminos. The Empyrean Lords have made it clear that I am to assist you in your training.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S3_Elemeltal_CTRL_02
string.body: I feel my abilities could be better utilized in actual battle...but the lords know best...they say.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S3_Elemeltal_CTRL_03
string.body: I hope you'll liven things up here for me. And you'll be paid for your performance, of course.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S3_Elemeltal_CTRL_04
string.body: Let us see how you fare against my spirits... They are wild, bedeviling creatures, so watch your hide, Daeva.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S3_Elemeltal_CTRL_05
string.body: Well, well, well...that wasn't too bad. Might even call that interesting.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S4_Draky_CTRL_01
string.body: I'm glad you've returned. Last time was...rather disappointing.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S4_Draky_CTRL_02
string.body: This time your foes will be...more lively. They are Drakies under my command. The more you dispose of, the tastier the prize.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S4_Draky_CTRL_03
string.body: Shall we get started?

string.name: STR_CHAT_S4_Draky_CTRL_04
string.body: Wonderful! Simply wonderful! If you ever return, I think I will face you personally.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S6_Ghost_55_Ah_01
string.body: My word is stone, Daeva. We shall meet in battle.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S6_Ghost_55_Ah_02
string.body: I bid you caution...even I cannot control them at times.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S6_Ghost_55_Ah_03
string.body: I am disappointed, Daeva. I thought, perhaps, I had finally found someone who could keep me...entertained.

string.name: STR_CHAT_S6_Ghost_55_Ah_04
string.body: Hahaha...this is terrific fun!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Ab1_IDAbRe_Info_Jemini_L_01
string.body: What if I told you there was a way to infiltrate the fortress?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Ab1_IDAbRe_Info_Nigos_D_01
string.body: Ive got an idea how you can get inside the fortress.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_A_01
string.body: Daeva, take the gift I prepared for the anniversary!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_A_02
string.body: Did you receive my gift?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_A_03
string.body: I prepared it specifically for Daevas.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_A_01
string.body: Daeva, take the gift I prepared for the anniversary!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_A_02
string.body: Did you receive my gift?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_A_03
string.body: I prepared it specifically for Daevas.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_B_01
string.body: Im glad to be able to talk to Daevas.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_B_02
string.body: Thats very touching.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_B_03
string.body: I hope the Elyos Ggum, Gui, Ggul, Ryo, Ddaemi and Mado (on server Israphel) are doing all right. They were the first to complete Tahabata across all servers.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_B_01
string.body: Im glad to be able to talk to Daevas.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_B_02
string.body: Id like to talk to the First Fortress Commander of all servers, Suho (on server Nezekan).

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_B_03
string.body: I wonder how Huiryu (on server Israphel) is doing. He was the first to reach the maximum level.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_B_04
string.body: I hope Changa, Salpa and Scythe (on server Nezekan) are doing all right. They were the first to complete Kromede.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_C_01
string.body: Im glad to see so many Daevas here!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_C_02
string.body: I hope everyone will get an epic item and be as happy as I am!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Perento_C_03
string.body: All Daevas receive an item from me with which they can hopefully perform successful enchantments.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_C_01
string.body: Im glad to see so many Daevas here!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_C_02
string.body: I hope everyone will get an epic item and be as happy as I am!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_200Days_Nerthus_C_03
string.body: All Daevas receive an item from me with which they can hopefully perform successful enchantments.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTiamatLab_War_Prisoner_01
string.body: Im alive! How fortunate!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTiamatLab_War_Prisoner_02
string.body: Thank you! I am free!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTiamatLab_War_Prisoner_03
string.body: Youre my saviour!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDTiamatLab_War_Prisoner_04
string.body: I thought I was going to die.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDArena_PvE_Party_Close_D
string.body: The Empyrean Crucible has been closed. I want to train!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDArena_PvE_Party_Close_L
string.body: The Empyrean Crucible has been closed. But my companions are on their way...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDArena_PvE_Solo_Close_D
string.body: My training is not yet complete, but the Crucible Challenge has been closed!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDArena_PvE_Solo_Close_L
string.body: The Crucible Challenge has been closed?! I just had to finish the last phase...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_Q_DrakanLab_Wi_50_An_Skill_Start
string.body: You made it this far...?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_Q_DrakanLab_Wi_50_An_Skill_1
string.body: The dead dont speak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_Q_DrakanLab_Wi_50_An_Skill_2
string.body: Ill blind you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_Q_DrakanLab_Wi_50_An_Skill_3
string.body: Unfortunately, youll have to take this secret to your grave!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_Q_DrakanLab_Wi_50_An_Skill_4
string.body: How persistent you are!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_Q_DrakanLab_Wi_50_An_Die
string.body: Urgh... Tiamat, you shall rule over all...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_War_BionicCPUNamed_50_Ah_Start
string.body: Warning. Unauthorised access. Warning. 3,2,1...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_War_BionicCPUNamed_50_Ah_Skill_1
string.body: Mode: Kill intruder confirmed.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_War_BionicCPUNamed_50_Ah_Skill_2
string.body: Going into defence mode.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamatLab_War_BionicCPUNamed_50_Ah_Die
string.body: Recovery impossible. Deactivating all functions...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDTiamatLab_Q_Mission_01
string.body: This garrison is closed.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDTiamatLab_Q_Mission_02
string.body: Main target. Siels Relic experiments were successful.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDTiamatLab_Q_Mission_03
string.body: Destroying all documents.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDTiamatLab_Q_Mission_04
string.body: Main target. The time project was successful.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Event_Chuseok_IDLF1_Rabbit_55_Ae_01
string.body: Rabbits should also eat rice cakes!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Event_Chuseok_IDLF1_Rabbit_55_Ae_02
string.body: Give me a rice cake and I wont eat you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_300_LOCATION_L_01
string.body: AION Classic has already been online for 300 days! Cool!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_300_LOCATION_L_02
string.body: Really? Already?

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_300_LOCATION_L_03
string.body: How time flies!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_300_LOCATION_D_01
string.body: AION Classic has already been online for 300 days! Cool!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_300_LOCATION_D_02
string.body: Really? Already?

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_300_LOCATION_D_03
string.body: How time flies!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_300_LOCATION_L_04
string.body: Lets dance!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_300_LOCATION_D_04
string.body: Lets dance!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_300_LOCATION_L_05
string.body: Has everyone tried the anniversary cake?

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_300_LOCATION_D_05
string.body: Has everyone tried the anniversary cake?

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_300_LOCATION_L_06
string.body: Hooray for the anniversary!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_300_LOCATION_D_06
string.body: Hooray for the anniversary!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_300_LOCATION_L_07
string.body: Welcome! Are you celebrating the 300-day anniversary? There are celebrations in the capital, thats why Im here. Here you go, the final anniversary present.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_300_LOCATION_D_07
string.body: Welcome! Are you celebrating the 300-day anniversary? There are celebrations in the capital, thats why Im here. Here you go, the final anniversary present.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Drakan_Runner01_Q_55_An_01
string.body: Ah, caught red-handed...! Now DIE!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Drakan_Runner01_Q_55_An_02
string.body: *cough*

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Drakan_Runner02_Q_55_An_01
string.body: It cant end like this...!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Drakan_Runner02_Q_55_An_02
string.body: Rest in pieces!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_01
string.body: Would Daeva like to play a game with me, ak?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_02
string.body: Daeva! Play a game with me, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_03
string.body: We havent forced anyone to take part in the game.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_04
string.body: Shugo didnt force Daeva to play the game.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_05
string.body: Caught by Golden Saam!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_06
string.body: Poppy poppy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_07
string.body: The Hasia flower has come into

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_08
string.body: bloom!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_09
string.body: The selection is random.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_10
string.body: Your eyes dont tell you everything there is to know.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_11
string.body: Your decision.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_12
string.body: Were not forcing anyone. Its up to you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_WEBTOON_L_01
string.body: Everyones talking about a Webtoon in which the legends of AION are recorded. If youre interested in the history of Atreia, you should look it up on Bufftoon.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_WEBTOON_L_02
string.body: Glory to Nezekan!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_WEBTOON_L_03
string.body: You can find the AION Webtoon on Bufftoon.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_WEBTOON_L_04
string.body: There also seems to be a special event taking place on Bufftoons event page.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_LC1_WEBTOON_L_05
string.body: You can receive a buff by clicking on the cart.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_WEBTOON_D_01
string.body: This is no ordinary cart! Click on it to receive the buff.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_WEBTOON_D_02
string.body: Ever been to Bufftoon? Theres a very special event taking place there.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_WEBTOON_D_03
string.body: Glory to Triniel!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_WEBTOON_D_04
string.body: Try to find the AION Webtoon on Bufftoon. There you will find lots of stories.

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_DC1_WEBTOON_D_05
string.body: Have you heard of the launch of the AION Webtoon? It tells of many adventures that people have experienced in AION. Try to take a look at it on Bufftoon.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Ticket_Win
string.body: You win. Heres a ticket, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Ticket_Lose
string.body: Hehe. I won, ak. No ticket for you, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_M_Win
string.body: I lost. Here, have a marble from me.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_M_Lose
string.body: I won, so Ill be taking a marble from you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_F_Win
string.body: I lost. Ill give you a marble.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_F_Lose
string.body: I won. You owe me a marble.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_ShugoM_Win
string.body: *sniff* Heres a marble from me, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_ShugoM_Lose
string.body: Joink! I won! Give me a marble, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_ShugoF_Win
string.body: Argh! I lost. Here, a marble, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_ShugoF_Lose
string.body: Hehehe! I win! Your marble is mine now, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage_Pass
string.body: Daeva needs to be patient until the next game begins, akakak!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_WORLD_EVENT_20TH_Need_Ticket
string.body: You dont have a Lottery Ticket.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_WORLD_US_QOOQOO_1_N_01
string.body: Qooqoos eat Vinnas too!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_WORLD_US_QOOQOO_1_N_02
string.body: Give me a Vinna and I wont eat you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Out_1
string.body: Heres the exit, ak. Little chicken Daeva, ak?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Out_2
string.body: Tickets that have already been used cant be refunded, ak. Daeva must choose wisely, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_Qooqoo_1
string.body: Catch me! Catch me if you can!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_Qooqoo_2
string.body: Qooqooku! Qooqoo! Qooqooqwak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage_2_Info
string.body: The entrance to the game is this way, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage_1_Info
string.body: The entrance to the 1st Game Room is just along here, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage_3_Info
string.body: The entrance to the 3rd Game Room is just along here, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage_4_Info
string.body: The entrance to the 4th Game Room is just along here, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage_5_Info
string.body: The entrance to the 5th Game Room is just along here, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_Pernos_01
string.body: Ho... Hocus-pocus!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_Pernos_02
string.body: Ho... Hopkins!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage5_Pass
string.body: One Daeva made it through already!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_L_M
string.body: Shugo used to be a marble expert once.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_L_F
string.body: Hmm, a challenge? Will Daeva partake?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_D_M
string.body: Hand over the marbles!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_D_F
string.body: Shugo needs marbles...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_ShugoM
string.body: Would Daeva like to play a game with Shugo?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Bead_ShugoF
string.body: Does Daeva know a lot about marbles?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage3_Manager_01
string.body: Daeva can come back to Shugo after winning 20 marbles, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage3_Manager_02
string.body: There are also marbles that others have lost or hidden. Daeva must look closely, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage3_Manager_03
string.body: Does Daeva know where Participant No. 0 is hiding, ak?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage3_Manager_04
string.body: Daeva better hurry up, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage5_Manager_01
string.body: The rewards are limited, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDPogusgame_NPC_Stage5_Manager_02
string.body: If Daeva is late, there will be none left.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDDF3_Boss_DrakanFiBossD_55_Ah_01
string.body: Is anyone there?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_event_kina_quest_01
string.body: Thanks for the exchange, ak.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_event_kina_quest_02
string.body: Daeva doesnt have enough crystals.
